description: When multiple CTEs each perform GROUP BY + WINDOW (cumulative sum), then are joined with FULL OUTER JOIN followed by another WINDOW pass for NULL carry-forward: defer the WINDOW out of the CTEs, join
Pre-filter dimension table into CTE, then pre-join with fact table in second CTE before joining other dimensions
Convert correlated subquery to separate CTE with GROUP BY, then JOIN
When query uses multiple date_dim aliases with different filters (d1, d2, d3), create separate CTEs for each date range and pre-join with fact tables
